function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Dynamic evolution of the pandemic","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transition from riskier to relatively safer options in investment strategies","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transition of funds to utilities, wholesale, and retail firms during the pandemic","category":"Business","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Cumulative investment decline in germany and france due to coronavirus spread","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Preference of growth firms by equity funds and value investing by fixed income may lead to concentration of investment in specific sectors, increasing the risk of contagion within those sectors.","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Concentration of social entrepreneurship funds in services and manufacturing sectors may lead to increased risk of contagion within these sectors.","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Significant increase in investments in large firms by equity funds and corporate money market funds during turbulent periods may create concentration risk and increase vulnerability to contagious diseases within specific sectors.","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Worsening market conditions impacting fund performance","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Negative risk-adjusted returns in phase 3 for treasury funds","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Financial market impact","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lockdown measures in eu member states","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for increased transmission of covid-19 within the eu due to investment fund activities and interactions","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for public health risk in investment decision making","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Neglect of social responsibility in investment strategies during covid-19 pandemic","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dynamic contagion of covid-19 across the european union","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Staggered overall response and financial speculation","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on diverse range of funds in europe","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Investors using alternate options to park their funds due to economic deterioration","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Declining yields on treasury instruments due to extreme pressure on public finances from covid-19","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variation in fund returns reflecting the impact of systemic shocks like covid-19","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to consider viral epidemics as a significant risk","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Scant evidence on economic
